Switch

使用样式选择器实现的交互，需要浏览器兼容使用js实现

<div class="ui-switch">
    <label>
        <input type="checkbox" name="name">
        <div class="switch">
            <div class="btn"></div>
        </div>
        <span class="ft-12 open">开</span>
        <span class="ft-12 close">关</span>
    </label>
</div>
开 
<div class="ui-switch">
    <div class="switch on">
        <div class="btn"></div>
    </div>
    <span class="ft-12">开</span>
</div>
